long_description: The Thule Glide Car Seat Adapter lets you carry most baby car seats on the Glide Stroller (sold separately) while you walk around town. Allows you to face your baby while you're strolling. Simple and easy installation. Compatible with popular infant car seat models. The Thule Glide Car Seat Adapter is designed for walking only; not to be used while running.
short_description: The Thule Glide Car Seat Adapter lets you carry most baby car seats on the Glide Stroller (sold separately) while you walk around town.
